citoid-520-error: Cannae get ony information fae the providit soorce.
citoid-citefromiddialog-use-general-erro: We couldnae mak ony reference fer ye. Ye can mak ane yersel wi the "{{int:citoid-citefromiddialog-mode-manual}}" tab abuin.
citoid-desc: Provides ingangs atween the citoid service and MediaWiki
citoid-unknown-error: An unbekent mistak his occurit and we cannae mak a reference for ye. Please hae anither gae.
